abstract: Pat Gelsinger, who runs Intel’s enterprise business, plans to leave the company, and Sean Maloney, head of sales and marketing, will take on a broader role, according to people briefed on the changes.
snippet: Pat Gelsinger, who runs Intel’s enterprise business, plans to leave the company, and Sean Maloney, head of sales and marketing, will take on a broader role, according to people briefed on the changes.
lead_paragraph: Update | Sept. 14, 2:13 a.m.  Added mention of Wall Street Journal report about Mr. Gelsinger going to EMC.

headline.main: Intel Is Said to Plot an Executive Overhaul

abstract: Intel is expected to reveal a sweeping management change on Monday, Bits reported.
snippet: Intel is expected to reveal a sweeping management change on Monday, Bits reported.

headline.main: Intel Is Said to Plot an Executive Overhaul
